description: System Registry - Master Index of all foundational JSON files for the Universal Brand System

biological.description: Hardwired human drives that operate beneath conscious thought

lf8.purpose: Life-Force 8 biological hierarchy with override logic

emotional_bonds.purpose: 9 Needs-based drivers that create lasting loyalty
emotional_bonds.structure: Named set with triggers and effects

biological.relationship: LF8 creates initial desire. Emotional Bonds create lasting loyalty.

awareness.description: Prospect state assessment and messaging strategy

schwartz_levels.purpose: 5 Awareness levels from Unaware to Most Aware

lead_archetypes.purpose: 6 Voice lead types matched to awareness levels

brand_archetypes.purpose: 4 Character archetypes for brand persona (Leader, Adventurer, Reporter, Reluctant Hero)
brand_archetypes.structure: Named set with voice posture and best-fit contexts

awareness.relationship: Awareness level determines lead archetype selection.

sugarman_elements.purpose: 23 Copy elements for Slippery Slide construction

headline_formulas.purpose: 12 Proven headline formulas with LF8 mapping

dr_rules.purpose: 10 Direct Response rules (every dollar must return ≥2×)

copywriting.relationship: DR Rules validate strategy. Sugarman builds copy. Headlines open.

enhancers.structure: Named set with permissions and applications

manana_antidotes.structure: Named set with mechanisms and alignment rules

choreography.relationship: Enhancers and antidotes govern conversion behavior under the Five Laws.

value_equation.purpose: Value Equation factors with canonical IDs

value_ladder.purpose: Value Ladder rungs with canonical IDs

value.relationship: Value Equation informs the offer; Value Ladder sequences offers.

headline_to_lf8.description: Each headline formula maps to specific LF8 drivers
headline_to_lf8.usage: Select headline based on primary LF8 driver, verify alignment

awareness_to_leads.description: Each awareness level maps to optimal lead archetype
awareness_to_leads.usage: Identify awareness first, then select matching lead

needs_to_bonds.description: 9 Needs inform which emotional bonds to activate at each moment
needs_to_bonds.usage: Diagnose unmet need, deploy matching copy pattern

sugarman_to_dr.description: 23 elements build copy that passes 10 DR rules
sugarman_to_dr.usage: Build with Sugarman, validate with DR Rules

enhancers_to_choreography.description: Five Psychological Enhancers are referenced by canonical ID
enhancers_to_choreography.implementation: registry/choreography/enhancers.json IDs referenced in choreography/storefront outputs
enhancers_to_choreography.usage: Select enhancer IDs, then document application and permission

manana_to_choreography.description: Seven Mañana Antidotes are referenced by canonical ID
manana_to_choreography.usage: Select antidote IDs, then document application and law alignment

value_to_covenant.description: Value Equation and Value Ladder use canonical IDs
value_to_covenant.usage: Reference IDs in Covenant outputs for consistency

derivation_chain.description: How frameworks connect from philosophy to execution

chain.statement: Build with proven elements, validate with rules
Execute with brand-specific tokens and patterns

agI_usage.description: How AGI should load and use these registries
loading_protocol: Load registry/sections.json for canonical section IDs
Load registry/system-manifest.json for canonical file map, schemas, and scripts
Load specific JSON files based on task type
Reference by semantic ID, never by position number

validation_rules.semantic_ids: All documents must reference frameworks by semantic ID (e.g., LF8_SURVIVAL, SUGAR_FIRST_SENTENCE)
validation_rules.no_bare_numbers: Never use bare numbers (#2, #6) to reference framework elements — numbers drift
validation_rules.source_of_truth: JSON files are canonical. If markdown disagrees, JSON wins.
validation_rules.system_manifest: registry/system-manifest.json defines required files and schema bindings; validate against it before execution.
validation_rules.brand_seed_canonical: Canonical input is brand-seed.json; brand-seed.md is a human-readable mirror only.
validation_rules.derivation_log_required: All layer outputs must include derivation_log with axiom, laws, source_sections, and decision chain.
validation_rules.seed_sufficiency: registry/seed-sufficiency-map.json defines non-derivable seed fields required for downstream outputs.
validation_rules.no_placeholders_outputs: Layer outputs must not contain TODO/TBD/REPLACE_ME or empty placeholder values.
validation_rules.section_ids: All cross-references must use SECTION_* IDs from registry/sections.json
validation_rules.update_protocol: When updating any JSON file, verify cross-references remain valid

enforcement.description: Machine-checkable rules to prevent future violations

lf8_references.enforcement_rule: All LF8 references must use semantic IDs from registry/biological/lf8.json. Bare numbers will drift.
lf8_references.validation_command: rg '#[1-8]' docs -g '*.md' should return zero LF8 references

dr_rule_references.enforcement_rule: All DR Rule references must use semantic IDs from registry/copywriting/dr-rules.json

awareness_references.enforcement_rule: All awareness level references must use semantic IDs from registry/awareness/schwartz-awareness.json

lead_archetype_references.enforcement_rule: All lead archetype references must use semantic IDs from registry/awareness/lead-archetypes.json

enhancer_references.enforcement_rule: All enhancer references must use semantic IDs from registry/choreography/enhancers.json

manana_antidote_references.enforcement_rule: All Mañana Antidote references must use semantic IDs from registry/choreography/manana-antidotes.json

value_ladder_references.enforcement_rule: All Value Ladder references must use semantic IDs from registry/value/value-ladder.json

headline_formula_references.enforcement_rule: All headline formula references must use semantic IDs from registry/copywriting/headline-formulas.json

sugarman_element_references.enforcement_rule: All Sugarman element references must use semantic IDs from registry/copywriting/sugarman-elements.json

cross_references.validation_rule: All cross-referenced SECTION_* IDs must exist in registry/sections.json
cross_references.broken_reference_check: rg 'SECTION_[A-Z0-9_]+' docs registry -g '*.md' -g '*.json' and verify IDs exist in registry/sections.json

schema_compliance.rule: All schema definitions must use semantic type references, not integer ranges
schema_compliance.required: lf8_id: enum[...] or similar semantic type
schema_compliance.validation_command: rg 'integer\[1-8\]' docs -g '*.md' should return zero matches

files_not_included.note: The following frameworks exist in markdown but not as separate JSON files (lower priority)
frameworks: Rule of One (embedded in persuasion-architecture reference)
files_not_included.rationale: These frameworks are well-documented in markdown and don't require separate JSON for AGI executability
